Generation III.Ruby: Illumise attracts a swarm of Volbeat using a sweet fragrance. Once the Volbeat have gathered, this Pok é mon leads the lit-up swarm in drawing geometric designs on the canvas of the night sky.
Generation III.Sapphire: Illumise leads a flight of illuminated Volbeat to draw signs in the night sky. This Pok é mon is said to earn greater respect from its peers by composing more complex designs in the sky.
Generation III.Emerald: A nocturnal Pok é mon that becomes active upon nightfall. It leads a Volbeat swarm to draw patterns in the night sky. Over 200 different patterns have been confirmed.
Generation III.FireRed: It guides Volbeat to draw signs in night skies. There are scientists that study the patterns it creates.
Generation III.LeafGreen: It guides Volbeat to draw signs in night skies. There are scientists that study the patterns it creates.
